Meher Bala

@meher on WordPress.org and Slack 









Member Since:
March 29th, 2011


Location:
Mumbai, India


Website:
meherbala.com


Job Title:
COO (Chief Operating Officer)


Employer:
KDC


Find me on:





 

Bio

Meher is the COO (Chief Operating Officer) at KDC and also a Codeable Expert.
She is a front-end developer, specializing in WordPress. She takes care of building and maintaining premium websites for her clients and delivers them within tight deadlines. A strong communicator, and highly motivated, Meher is equipped with a sharp understanding of business.
She has worked with multiple brands, and agencies to build their dream website for over 15+ years. 
Along with a creative flair for design and aesthetics, she also has an analytical bent of mind that makes her a distinguished talent from the crowd.
Apart from her remarkable talent for understanding clients and delivering the best to her clients, she is also highly motivated, organized, and proactive.

Interests

Food blogging and photography, find me on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/bandrafoodie/

WordPress Origin Story

1) Co-organizers for WordPress Mumbai Community since 2015. 
2) Co-organizers for WordCamp Mumbai 2016, 2017 and 2018.
3) Lead Organizer for WordCamp Mumbai 2019.
4) Co-organizers for WooCommerce Mumbai Community.
5) Been a part of other WordCamps around India.
6) An opportunity to volunteer my time on the main event day for WordCamp Europe 2020 – for the communication team and also helped the marketing team on the Contributor Day.   
7) Co-organizer for WordPress Translation Day Min-event 2020
8) WordPress Marketing Team Rep since September 2020
9) Part of the Release Squad for WordPress 5.6
10) Co-organizer WordCamp India 2021
11) Volunteered for WordCamp Europe in 2020 and 2021


				Contributions
									Sponsored


KDC Tek Private Limited sponsors Meher Bala to contribute 6 hours per week to the following teams: Community, Marketing, Photos, and Training.
